All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccessTokenValidator
AccessTokenValidator validates an OAuth 2 access token.
ApplicationConfig
ApplicationConfig provides an interface for retrieving configuration values, allowing for implicit type conversion, defaulting, and use of a runtime properties interface to override configured settings.
BinderFactory
A binder factory builds a custom binder for the Jersey application.
CorsFilter
CorsFilter prevents corss-origin request error in local dev environment, and abort the preflight request and make the request successful.
ES384JwtTokenValidator
ES384JwtTokenValidator validates an JWT token in ES384 JWS form.
JpaDatastoreConfig
JpaDatastoreConfig is responsible for all configs related to Elide JPA middleware.
OAuthConfig
OAuthConfig is responsible for all configs related to OAuth 2 aspects of the template.
OAuthFilter
OAuthFilter is responsible for all OAuth 2 authorization logics, excluding authentications.
ResourceConfig
The resource configuration for the web applications.
